Name: The Legend of Monster Mountain
About the game: The spell of the Monster Mountain was broken, the released monsters took Keyao's sister. For saving his sister, Keyao started an incredible adventure. THE LEGEND OF MONSTER MOUNTAIN is a puzzle game made with RPGMAKER . Players will use magical props and traps to fight against enemies and crack the puzzles in the level.
